item.title: Plz can someone send me his starter command
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

oops forgot to tell you to make these:
Find:

public int sidebarChangeTimer;

hit space after the ; and insert this:

public int starter = 0;

you might need this: search:

			characterfile.write("character-clueid = ", 0, 19);

and hit enter after the ; and add

characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length()); characterfile.newLine();
of course if that is the case, you need to import this:

import java.text.*;

Starter is nothing. Is just like giving items to people.

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
hang on… ill fix it for u (well try lol)

ffs.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 1000000); addItem(550, 1); addItem(1856,1); sendMessage("The starter packet for Dark Age Scape Players !"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

Search: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("
and hit space like once or twice [depends on your source] and paste the code in
